sense.gloss: to be placed on, to be set on, to be piled on, to be loaded on
to appear (in print), to be mentioned, to be recorded, to be reported, to be given

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑次↑↓つぎ↓に↑分↑↓わ↓かることは↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓に|↑載↑↓の↓る|ってことだ。
sdata.e: Next thing you know, you'll be in the papers.

sdata.j: ↑選挙↑↓せんきょ↓の↑結果↑↓けっか↓は↑夕刊↑↓ゆうかん↓に|↑載↑↓の↓る|でしょう。
sdata.e: The results of the election will appear in the evening paper.
